name: DedMan
description:
Our game is a 2D shooter made by the golden hands of developers and designed to take your attention for many years.

In this game you can:

1. Feel like an old man who did not receive his pension on time

2. Knead bandits

3. Knead the bandits even more

4. Blow up bandits

5. Jump on bandits

6. Run away from bandits

7. Buy incredible items (to effectively kill bandits)

8. Die from bandits ;c

This masterpiece was published after a long 300 days of hard working, so it confirms the ideality of the implementation of this project (during this period of time, not a single developer was injured, but more than a thousand bandits were killed)

We spent hundreds of hours testing the mechanics of our great game so that you could definitely get the sensations that we originally laid in our unique creation.

Enjoy the game!
